attributes.action: recruit more officers into the met police.
attributes.background: I want the government to make a change and actually recruit more officers and not tell us they will do it, but never end up getting to it.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about recruitment for local police forces are a matter for the management of the relevant police force - in this case the Metropolitan Police - not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund increase in police officers in line with population: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618553
